name: Bobby & Robby
description: This game was made in 2 days for the united game jam. In this game you play two characters named Bobby & Robby and you try to get to the ending platform. I made this in Unity. The theme was two and my game is relevant to it because you play as two characters and there are two "mechanics", you can switch what character you're controlling by pressing s and you can jump from a characters head.
